*한글화 : 되어있으나 가끔 이해가 안되는 문장들
*난이도 및 진입장벽 : 상

So i'm leaving a negative review not to say it hasn't brought me lots of fun but that was more in the beginning before it had all these new killers and survivors. I like it when it had a few new killers that were pretty iconic like myers and ghostface, it was great and fun to play against/with, but with the recent addition of Wesker as a killer from Resident Evil when we had already gotten Nemesis, It just feels... cramped and quite frankly annoying to keep up with. I know people love DBD for the amount of refreshing content it brings but its gotten to a point where its like a memory game for survivors and killers alike. Having to remember all these unique perks and powers released with each new chapter that just adds more and more confusion to this game. I feel as though behavior has dragged DBD along for too long now and should have let it go a long time ago where it was a more simpler time, a more enjoyable time, where they didn't screw with our Dead Hard. Albeit, I am going to check in on this game from time to time, but as it stands I cant bare to play more than 2 matches in a row.

Adorei ler os comentários dos survivors chorarem pelo fato de os killers estarem sempre os matando, pois quando eu jogava esse game, que por sinal era de main killer, não vi nenhuma piedade desses mesmos reclamões. Bem, parei de jogar faz tempo, mas só do fato de ver esses old survs tóxicos estarem chorando tanto me faz a refletir que o jogo realmente tá uma m3rd4. Concluindo, só jogue esse game se tu tiver com 5 amigos, 1 deles sendo o killer e os outros 4 survs ,em lobby fechada, tenho certeza que a experiência dessa forma será bem melhor para todos os 5.

This game is shit. Played for so long and still full of bugs, tunnelers, campers, hackers and op killers. They are stil not nerfing the dredge for no reason at all but nerfing other useless perks which are not even used. In the first week or two you will like this game so hard that you will want to play it all day but then you will see how shit this game is when you reach higher ranks.
